ComicInfo.Summary: Nettie’s reunion with her baby daughter isn’t all she’d hoped--Essie’s grown six years in a few moments apart, and now she doesn’t even remember her mother. Not to mention that she’s the leader of a rebel kid army and hangs out with a giant bunny god all day. Meanwhile, Jude and Hemingway are separated from the group and end up sunning somewhere a little too warm, and the Foreman deals with the repercussions of losing Jude in some not-so-pleasant ways.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2025-01-05 09:19:27. [CVDB480764]
ComicInfo.Characters: Coyote, Dionysus, Ernest Hemingway, Essie, Ganesha, God, Jude, Nettie, Ometochtli, Satan, Tom Foreman
